scorable_questions.name: businessDrivers5
scorable_questions.title: How effective will the system likely be in meeting client needs?

scorable_questions.name: businessDrivers9
scorable_questions.title: Have alternative non-automated processes been considered?

scorable_questions.name: businessDrivers11
scorable_questions.title: What would be the consequence of not deploying the system?

choices.text: Service cannot be delivered at all
Service cannot be delivered in a timely or efficient manner
Service quality is not as high
Service delivery cannot achieve performance targets

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile1
scorable_questions.title: Is the project within an area of intense public scrutiny (for example, because of privacy concerns) and/or frequent litigation?

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile2
scorable_questions.title: Does the line of business serve equity denied groups?

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile3
scorable_questions.title: Are there any population groups that the automated decision system should not be applied to?

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile4
scorable_questions.title: Has the system been assessed to understand whether it would create or exacerbate barriers for persons with disabilities, and are measures in place to address any identified issues?

choices.text: Assessment has been conducted, and no barriers were identified.
Assessment has been conducted, barriers were identified, and measures are in place or planned to remove or prevent them.
Assessment was conducted, barriers were identified, and no measures were put in place or planned to remove or prevent them.

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile7
scorable_questions.title: Could the automated decision-system be at heightened risk of being an exploitation target for malicious actors (for example, fraud for financial gain)?

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile8
scorable_questions.title: Have potential issues or harms with the existing service delivery approach been raised by clients or their representatives, the media, audits or parliamentary committees?

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile9
scorable_questions.title: Will you be submitting a concept case to TBS and presenting the project to the Government of Canada Enterprise Architecture Review Board?

scorable_questions.name: riskProfile10
scorable_questions.title: Have you submitted a concept case to TBS and presented the project to the Government of Canada Enterprise Architecture Review Board?

scorable_questions.name: projectAuthority1
scorable_questions.title: Will you require new policy or legal authority for this project?

scorable_questions.title: Who developed the system?

scorable_questions.name: aboutSystem4
scorable_questions.title: Who configured the system?

scorable_questions.title: Is the system:

scorable_questions.name: aboutSystem5B
scorable_questions.title: Has the product been customized to add functionality beyond what is available off the shelf?

scorable_questions.title: Have you assigned accountability in your institution for the design, development, and maintenance, of the system?

scorable_questions.name: aboutSystem7
scorable_questions.title: Is there a group in your institution responsible for identifying and implementing opportunities for improvement?

scorable_questions.name: aboutSystem8
scorable_questions.title: Does your system conform with the appropriate clauses of standard CAN/ASC EN 301 549:2024, Accessibility requirements for Information and Communication Technology (ICT) products and services?

scorable_questions.name: aboutSystem9
scorable_questions.title: Is a non-automated alternative planned and available in the event the automated decision system was unavailable for an extended period of time?

scorable_questions.name: aboutSystem10A
scorable_questions.title: Is there a process in place to grant, monitor, and revoke access permission to the system?

scorable_questions.name: aboutSystem11
scorable_questions.title: The impacts that the development, operation, and maintenance of the system could have on the ongoing sustainability of an environmental ecosystem, may be:

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm1
scorable_questions.title: The algorithm used will be a (trade) secret

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm2
scorable_questions.title: The algorithmic process will be difficult to interpret or to explain

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm3
scorable_questions.title: Is the algorithm (Check all that apply):

choices.text: Based on rules developed from laws and policy and/or using human expertise (for example, if/then statements)
Based on patterns in data identified by the AI model (for example, neural network, deep learning)

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm4
scorable_questions.title: If the automated decision-system is model based, is the model inference (select all that apply):

choices.text: Deterministic (follow precise rules and generate single outcome)
Probabilistic (infer several models to explain data)

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm5
scorable_questions.title: Is the model:

choices.text: Discriminative (for example, regression analyses, decision trees)
Generative (for example, linear discriminant analysis, naïve Bayes)

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm8
scorable_questions.title: Will the algorithm continue to learn and evolve as it is used?

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm8A
scorable_questions.title: If yes, are there mechanisms in place to monitor the changes?

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm9
scorable_questions.title: Does the algorithm consider protected characteristics to make its decisions or recommendations?

scorable_questions.name: aboutAlgorithm11
scorable_questions.title: Have you evaluated whether variables that the system bases its decisions or recommendations on could be proxies for protected characteristics?

scorable_questions.name: decisionSector1
scorable_questions.title: Does the decision pertain to any of the categories below (check all that apply). Note that the examples in brackets are not exhaustive.

choices.text: Health-related services (environmental and workplace health, product and food safety, drug regulation)
Economic interests (grants and contributions, tax benefits, debt collection)
Social assistance (employment insurance, disability or housing benefits, children or seniors programs)
Access and mobility (security clearances, border management, immigration)
Licensing and issuance of permits (possession and acquisition licence, export permits, commercial fishing licence)
Employment (recruitment, hiring, promotion, performance evaluation, monitoring, security clearance)
Public safety and law enforcement (investigating criminal acts)

scorable_questions.name: impact30
scorable_questions.title: Which of the following best describes the type of automation you are planning?

choices.text: Full automation (the system will make an administrative decision)
Partial automation (the system will contribute to administrative decision-making by supporting an officer with assessments, recommendations, intermediate decisions, or other outputs)

scorable_questions.name: impact3
scorable_questions.title: Will the system be making decisions or assessments that require judgment or discretion?

scorable_questions.name: impact4A
scorable_questions.title: Will this project have major impacts on staff, either in terms of their numbers or their roles?

scorable_questions.name: impact22
scorable_questions.title: Will the system perform an assessment or other operation that is not currently completed by a human?

scorable_questions.name: impact5
scorable_questions.title: Is the system used by a different part of the organization than the ones who developed it?

scorable_questions.name: impact6
scorable_questions.title: Are the impacts resulting from the decision reversible?

scorable_questions.name: impact7
scorable_questions.title: How long could impacts from the decision last?

choices.text: Impacts are most likely to be brief
Some impacts may last a matter of months, but some lingering impacts may last longer

scorable_questions.name: impact9
scorable_questions.title: The impacts that the decision could have on the rights or freedoms of individuals may be:

scorable_questions.name: impact24
scorable_questions.title: The impacts that the decision could have on the equality, dignity, privacy, and autonomy of individuals may be:

scorable_questions.name: impact11
scorable_questions.title: The impacts that the decision could have on the health and well-being of individuals may be:

scorable_questions.name: impact13
scorable_questions.title: The impacts that the decision could have on the economic interests of individuals may be:

scorable_questions.name: impact15
scorable_questions.title: The impacts that the decision could have on the ongoing sustainability of an environmental ecosystem, may be:

scorable_questions.name: impact18
scorable_questions.title: Have you assessed system performance for clients with a range of personal and intersectional identity factors (for example, gender, age, race, language, ethnicity, disability) to verify that decisions and outcomes are fair for a diverse group of people, and have the identified disparities been addressed?

choices.text: Assessment conducted; no performance differences identified.
Assessment conducted; performance differences identified and are justified. Downstream impacts of performance difference have not been considered or addressed.
Assessment conducted; performance differences identified which are not justified. Downstream impacts of the performance difference considered and addressed.
Assessment conducted; performance differences identified and are justified. Downstream impacts have been considered and addressed.
Assessment conducted; performance differences are identified and are not justified. Downstream impacts of the performance differences not considered or addressed.

scorable_questions.name: impact19I
scorable_questions.title: Have you tested system performance for clients with a variety of different disabilities?

scorable_questions.name: impact23
scorable_questions.title: Are there clients or groups of clients that will experience the most significant negative impacts from the system being used?

scorable_questions.name: impact26
scorable_questions.title: What proportion of clients will the system be applied to?

scorable_questions.name: impact27
scorable_questions.title: Could not being subject to the use of the tool have a negative impact on an individual or groups of individuals?

scorable_questions.name: impact28
scorable_questions.title: The impact of individuals being wrongfully included or overlooked by the system could be:

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign1
scorable_questions.title: Will the audit trail provide information to trace the chain of legislative authority for the decision and key decision points?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign1A
scorable_questions.title: Will all key decision points in the automated system's logic be linked to the relevant legislation, policy or procedure?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign2
scorable_questions.title: Will the audit trail capture all the recommendations or decisions made by the system?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign3
scorable_questions.title: Will all key decision points be identifiable in the audit trail?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign4
scorable_questions.title: Will there be a process in place to log the instances when overrides were performed?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign5
scorable_questions.title: Will there be an up-to-date log of the changes made to the model and the system?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign7
scorable_questions.title: Will the audit trail capture information that can be used to help generate an explanation of the decision where required?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign10
scorable_questions.title: Will the system be able to produce reasons for its decisions or recommendations when required?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign8
scorable_questions.title: Will the audit trail identify precisely which version of the system was used for each decision it supports?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign9
scorable_questions.title: Will the audit trail show who the authorized decision-maker is?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign12
scorable_questions.title: Will there be a mechanism to capture feedback by users of the system?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign13
scorable_questions.title: Will there be a recourse process planned or established for clients to challenge the decision?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign16
scorable_questions.title: Will the audit trail include change control processes to record modifications to the system's operation or performance?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign17
scorable_questions.title: Will the system base its decision or recommendation on all of the information provided by the client?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign18
scorable_questions.title: Will you undertake mitigations in algorithm development and model testing to address bias and discrimination?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign19
scorable_questions.title: Will the system only consider input data and information relevant to the decision?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign20
scorable_questions.title: Are the system rules directly relevant to the administrative decision?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign21
scorable_questions.title: Indicate additional procedural fairness protections in place (check all that apply):

choices.text: Clear time frame or service standards for timeliness
Clients are provided with adequate information about the decision-making process and have the opportunity to meaningfully participate
Clients are provided with all documents and information in which the administrative decision was based
Mechanism for assessing and responding to client feedback

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign22
scorable_questions.title: Are there processes in place to ensure impartiality and ethical conduct by the decision-maker in the use of the system and its outputs?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign22A
scorable_questions.title: Will you undertake training on appropriate use and awareness of risks associated with automation bias?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign23
scorable_questions.title: Will your team be regularly retraining the model or reviewing the rules?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign24
scorable_questions.title: Do you have monitoring processes in place to detect changes in system performance over time?

scorable_questions.name: fairnessDesign24A
scorable_questions.title: Do you have a process in place to update the system based on the monitoring results?
